about_the_game:
GME is a virtual tabletop designed to empower RPG enthusiasts around the world to come together, regardless of geography, with real-time map updates, integrated player chat, and ultra-low latency. Whether your players are near or far, you can maintain the flow of the game without interruption.





    Unlike many other VTTs, GME offers a one-time purchase model with no subscription fees or hidden charges. Best of all, players can join and play for free, ensuring that everyone can participate without additional financial burdens.




    Our drag-and-drop interface, coupled with a vast library of over 3,500 assets (including RPG-themed minis), lets you build a world as rich as your imagination.




    Bring your story to life with a variety of stunning VFX, including spell effects, portals, explosions, shields, smoke, lighting, camera filters, and weather changes.




    GMs of all levels can fight burnout and find community in the GME Discord server. Join events, participate in competitions, and connect with fellow GMs who share your passion. Swap maps, enter giveaways, ask questions, give recommendations, or simply hang out with other cool people (including the devs!).



    The GME team actively seeks input from the community, creating a user-driven experience that evolves in line with the needs and desires of its players. This structure allows them to quickly implement bug fixes, address user pain points, and develop features that the community has requested.



    GME isn't just another VTT; it’s designed for and by GMs to address the unique challenges GMs face. Join our community of storytellers who have transformed their campaigns with GME. Download Game Master Engine - GM Edition today and revive your love of the game.






    Finding the time to create an engaging campaign from scratch can be challenging, especially for busy GMs or those looking to run a last-minute session. GME will soon offer pre-built story modules that come with everything you need to run a campaign, including detailed storylines, pre-built maps, and fully populated miniatures, allowing you to dive right into the action with minimal prep time.





    Placing plants and trees one by one can be satisfying...until you have a huge map to fill in. Our botanical brush feature will allow you to select a list of foliage items from the asset library, then let you "paint" that foliage directly onto the map, saving you hours of work while creating lush, eye-catching environments your players will be itching to explore.





    Sometimes you just need a map, fast. With the push of a button, GME will generate a custom environment just for you. Even better? It's fully editable, which means you can tweak the design as much as you'd like, or easily delete the entire thing and start again.

name: Game Master Engine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 24 GB available space

short_description: Transform your virtual tabletop RPG experience in Game Master Engine’s lush 3D multiplayer RPG simulator. Whether you're a seasoned game master or just starting out, GME makes it easy to explore, create, and run custom games, all while bringing your players together for unforgettable adventures.
